description: Supine RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position associated with >= 5% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp5 + hnrbp5 + carbp5 + canbp5 + oarbp5 + oanbp5 ) / ( remepbp + nremepbp )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Supine RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation
